summary: The Protect the First Amendment Act (H.R. 4067) aims to prohibit the U.S. Federal Government from using funds to contract with or grant awards to entities that engage in censorship. Specifically, it targets NewsGuard Technologies, Inc. (and successors) and the Global Disinformation Index (and successors), and any nonprofit or other entity that demonetizes or rates the credibility of domestic entities based on their lawful speech, alleging it is misinformation.
